column6: Thor's ne'er-do-well brother Loki guest-stars in a 2-part story arc. In the aftermath of the inter-dimensional rift caused by Spider-Man & Doctor Strange's battle with Dormammu, a sorceress of limitless power is set free from years of captivity ... and sets forth on a quest through Manhattan to properly thank the one responsible for it - Spider-Man! 32 PGS./MARVEL PSR...$2.25
column8: | inker:Scott Hanna | writer:Stan Lee | penciller (cover):John Romita JR.
